name: Mastery Talisman: Shield Rush
description: After your character uses a Skill: If your active character has a Shield or is defended by a Combat Status, then your characters deal +1 DMG this Round. (Can stack up to +3 DMG)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Skill:</color> If your active character has a $[K6] or is defended by a Combat Status, then your characters deal +1 DMG this Round. (Can stack up to +3 DMG)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Skill:</color> If your active character has a {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> or is defended by a Combat Status, then your characters deal +1 DMG this Round. (Can stack up to +3 DMG)
